FuncDef: This command configures the ETH-CFM maintenance endpoint (MEP). A MEP created at the VPLS service levelvpls>eth-cfmcreates a virtual MEP.
CLIs: mep <mep-id> domain <md-index> association <ma-index> [ direction { up | down } ] [ primary-vlan-enable ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the MEP identifier. Values-1 to 8191.
Specifies the maintenance domain (MD) index value. Values-1 to 4294967295.
Specifies the maintenance association (MA) index value. Values-1 to 4294967295.
Indicates the direction in which the MEP faces on the bridge port. Direction is not supported when a MEP is created directly under the vpls>eth-cfm construct (vMEP).

Provides a method for linking the MEP with the primary VLAN configured under the bridge-identifier for the MA. MEPs cannot be changed from or to primary VLAN functions. This must be configured as part of the creation step and can only be changed by deleting the MEP and re-creating it. Primary VLANs are only supported under Layer 2 Epipe and VPLS services.
